page.title: 17Recreation in Woodford
page.content: Many events take place in the community hall.A nursery class is held every morning and all day on Thursday. Also coffee mornings,sometimes for charity,are held on a regular basis.The women's institute meet here and the Crusaders religious group meet together every week. Other clubs such as Badminton,table tennis and bridge all meet here.The biggest event of the year is the Rose Queen Festival.This is held annually in June and most of the village are involved in some way or other.The crowning of the Queen is performed in the community centre.
